sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.subtitle: Your wingfoil session history
sessions.noSessionsDesc: Connect to Strava and sync your activities to see your wingfoil sessions.

sessionDetail.sessionNotFoundDesc: This session does not exist or has been deleted.
sessionDetail.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session?

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure the app and detection settings
settings.minSpeedDesc: Speed above which we consider you are riding
settings.minRunDurationDesc: Minimum duration for a run to be counted
settings.minStopDurationDesc: Minimum stop time to separate two runs
settings.speedSmoothingDesc: Number of points to smooth speed variations
settings.saveNote: Note: After saving, you will need to reanalyze your existing sessions to apply the new settings.
settings.optimizePruned: old sessions optimized. Detailed GPS data has been removed from the oldest sessions.
settings.optimizeError: Error during optimization. Try deleting some sessions manually.
settings.optimizeNote: Optimization compresses data and removes detailed GPS data from old sessions (keeping the 20 most recent).
settings.dangerZoneDesc: These actions are irreversible. Proceed with caution.
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure? All your sessions and settings will be deleted.
settings.compatible: Compatible with Garmin watches via Strava

login.title: Wingfoil Tracker
login.subtitle: Track your wingfoil progress
login.description: Analyze your sessions, track your runs, and measure your progress over time.
login.feature1Desc: Our algorithm detects your runs from Strava GPS data using mathematical rules
login.feature2Desc: Duration, distance, speed, heart rate for each run
login.feature3Desc: Visualize your improvement session after session
login.stravaNote: We look for Wingfoil sessions tagged as Kitesurf on Strava

spots.title: Spots
spots.subtitle: Your favorite wingfoil spots
spots.noSpotsDesc: Sync your sessions to discover your wingfoil spots.

map.noGpsData: No GPS data available for this session

errors.storageFull: Storage is full. Try deleting old sessions or exporting your data.
